channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Anarchist
channel.description:
Anarchist - Neutral Offensive
Passive: Lawless - You cannot step up to be King. Day ability 1: Bewilder - Disable the kings day ability's for the day. (2 uses) Day ability 2: Coup - Your target takes one less vote to be put on the stand. If he is put up to the stand this way then he is immediately executed (this is announced)(2 uses) Night ability 1: Trace lineage - Determine if your targets starting class had royal blood (unlimited) Night ability 2: Back stab - Make the King bleed (1 use) (cannot be used until night 4)
Goal: Kill all royals including the starting King.
Alternatively the goal could be to have the game end with there not being a king. If so the passive should instead make you become the Mad King but with the same objective that you have now.
